mapper.select: SELECT t2.id_card idCard, t2.phone_number phoneNumber, t3.`name` setMealName, t2.`name` memberName, t1.order_date orderDate, t1.order_type orderType FROM `t_order` t1 left join t_member t2 on t2.id=t1.member_id LEFT JOIN t_setmeal t3 on t3.id = t1.setmeal_id where t1.id = #{orderId};
